dcterms:description: A dataset containing 960 hours of training data for automatic speech recognition tasks, used to evaluate the General Quantizer (GQ) method.
dcterms:title: LibriSpeech

dcterms:description: A de-identified dataset consisting of 100k hours of human transcribed data, used for training and evaluating the Bifocal RNN-T model.
dcterms:title: De-identified far-field dataset
